LanguageData.GravNausea.label: grav nausea
LanguageData.GravNausea.description: Intense nausea caused by sudden acceleration or deceleration on a gravship.
LanguageData.ThrumboRoar.label: thrumbo roar
LanguageData.ThrumboRoar.description: This creature has been shaken by the powerful roar of a thrumbo.
LanguageData.VacuumExposure.label: vacuum exposure
LanguageData.VacuumExposure.description: This creature is suffering a variety of negative effects caused by exposure to the vacuum of space, including hypoxia and decompression sickness. They will soon die unless they can get to a pressurized area.
LanguageData.VacuumExposure.stages.initial-0.label: initial
LanguageData.VacuumExposure.stages.initial-1.label: initial
LanguageData.VacuumExposure.stages.mild.label: mild
LanguageData.VacuumExposure.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.VacuumExposure.stages.extreme.label: extreme
LanguageData.VolcanicAsh.label: volcanic ash
LanguageData.WarTrumpet.label: war trumpet
LanguageData.WarTrumpet.description: This creature has been shaken by the powerful trumpeting of a mighty beast.
